name: Paint Works
overview: Named after the classic quick guessing show on German television, Die Montagsmaler guarantees real creative fun for the whole family on the Wii. This makes it the first painting and creative game format on the motion console. It is all about drawing, guessing, painting and colouring. Whether alone or with up to four players - this game offers variety and pure entertainment. The party really gets going, especially in multiplayer mode: grab friends or family and off you go! Whoever guesses the searched terms first in the game »Monday Painter« wins the match. The game principle used is intuitive and ensures long-lasting guessing fun. But the single player mode is also impressive: Here the player draws figures, stamps or sprays crazy motifs. Features: * The first painting fun for the Wii: 14 different games about painting, drawing and colors * Let your creativity run free: Large creative part with paint boxes, mandalas and collages * Which one of you is the next Picasso? Gallery to save your own artworks * Also included: Over 500 terms for tracing and guessing are included with the game on extra playing cards. This is how »The Monday painter« becomes a real parlor game! * Dexterity, guesswork and creativity: For 1-4 players
